channel.title: Sounds
channel.description: Hi , I would like to ask how can I get sounds for when I attack with a weap or someone near me does anyway like whip sound im not asking WHERE to get im just asking HOW I suppose i put the sound in cache folder then i have to make some code that plays it to me and anyone around me when i hit with a certain weapon sooo... how?

item.title: Sounds
item.dc:creator: @atrox atrox_
item.description:
@atrox wrote:

[quote=“Not Pwnd, post:2, topic:237985”]frame74(USE A NUMBER HERE);

or

frame121(NUMBER, NUMBER);

at the appropriate time. If your client supports moosic/sounds it will play sumthin[/quote]

You gave an example of what to use, but why didnt you post the methods required?

Read full topic

item.title: Sounds
item.dc:creator: @P_I_M_P_3_D_Tut `Lewk_
item.description:
@P_I_M_P_3_D_Tut wrote:

[quote=“Not Pwnd, post:2, topic:237985”]frame74(USE A NUMBER HERE);

or

frame121(NUMBER, NUMBER);

at the appropriate time. If your client supports moosic/sounds it will play sumthin[/quote] depends on the server and cache. If you cache and client support it then your good.
